creator: Lokal - India's No 1 Local News, Local Jobs App
descriptionHtml:
Lokal App is India’s first local news aggregator app which gives Hindi, Telugu and Tamil local news in:
UP - Kanpur nagar, Etawah, Muzzafarnagar districts
Andhra and Telangana - Hyderabad city, Anantapur, Kadapa, Vizianagaram, Kurnool, Visakhapatnam, East Godavari, Chittoor, Guntur, Bhadradri Kothagudem, Sangareddy, Mahabubnagar, Nizamabad, Kamareddy, Mahabubabad, Khammam, Siddipet, Yadadri Bhongir, Karimnagar, Krishna-Vijayawada, Warangal, Suryapet and Nalgonda districts
Tamil Nadu Tiruppur, Salem, Erode districts

Get Telangana municipal election news on Lokal App

Get Uttar Pradesh, Tamil Nadu, Telangana and Andhra Pradesh breaking news, viral news, daily news bulletin, local news, politics, sports, current affairs, devotional, educational, government job notifications, employment news, crime, entertainment, live cricket news, job notifications, horoscope, and agriculture news in Telugu Tamil and Hindi on Lokal App.

Features -
Lokal app offers Hindi, Tamil and Telugu News with unique features :
👉 Get viral video and trending video news from your region 🔥
👉 Get regular jobs and employment updates from districts of Uttar Pradesh, Telangana, Andhra Pradesh and Tamil Nadu in Telugu, Hindi and Tamil. 👨‍✈🛄
👉 Lokal TV - Viral news updates to share on WhatsApp groups, set as WhatsApp Status🔪
👉 Follow the latest political and election-related news of your city, jilla, and state in Telugu, Tamil and Hindi. 👆
👉 Share local Telugu, Tamil and Hindi news with your friends and family on Whatsapp Status, Facebook Stories, Messenger Stories, etc. 👻
👉 Follow your daily horoscope, astrology, Rashi phalalu and Bhavishyavani. 🌠🌅
👉 Submit local Hindi, Tamil and Telugu news and become famous in your region. 🗣💬
👉 Get Telugu, Tamil and Hindi language related Entertainment and movie updates on Lokal App daily 👦🏻👩🧛‍♂️🎬
👉 Download videos and set WhatsApp status, send news on WhatsApp Groups
👉 Get Job Notifications, Employment news - Local jobs, government jobs, private jobs, vidya-udyogalu news and fresher jobs, 10th Pass local jobs, 12th Jobs, Intermediate Jobs, UG jobs, PG jobs, degree jobs, and diploma jobs 👩‍🎓👨‍🔧👨‍🔬
👉 Get Daily local news updates, current affairs, question answers, quizzes and polls for exam and job preparation.
👉 Get sports update about cricket, badminton, Tennis, Kabaddi, Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma, Mahendra Singh Dhoni, P. V Sindhu, Saina Nehwal and Sania Mirza.

Andhra Pradesh
Anantapur jobs, Kadapa jobs, Vizianagaram jobs, Kurnool jobs, Visakhapatnam jobs, East Godavari jobs, Chittoor jobs, Guntur jobs, Krishna-Vijayawada jobs, Prakasham jobs, Nellore jobs
Get news from YSR Congress Party, TDP, Janasena Party, YS Jagan Mohan Reddy, Chandrababu Naidu, Nara Lokesh, Pawan Kalyan, Sharmila Kodali nani, Rapaka Varaprasad

Telangana Government Jobs
Hyderabad jobs, Nalgonda jobs, Suryapet jobs, Warangal jobs, Karimnagar jobs, Nizamabad-Kamareddy jobs, Siddipet jobs, Yadadri-Bhongir jobs, Mahabubnagar jobs, Sangareddy jobs, Khammam jobs, Bhadradri-Kothagudem jobs
Get Congress, TRS, BJP, KCR, KTR, AIMIM, Asaduddin owaisi, Harish Rao, Revanth Reddy, Kishan Reddy News

Uttar Pradesh News and Jobs
Kanpur nagar, Muzaffarnagar and Etawah
Get news about Yogi Adityanath, Narendra Modi, Kapil Dev Agrawal, Mayawati, Akhilesh Yadav, Gaurav Swarup Bansal, Rakesh Kumar Sharma, Payal Maheshwari, Rahul Gandhi, Sonia Gandhi, Priyanka Gandhi, Amit Shah, Arvind Kejriwal, Jyotiraditya Scindia, SP, BSP, BJP and Congress

Tamil Nadu News and Jobs
Tiruppur District. Get news about Palani Swami, Stalin, Rajnikanth, Thalapathy Vijay, Kamal Hassan, Subbarayan, Anandan, DMK, AIADMK

Get instant notifications about day to day local news, political news, govt jobs

appDetails.developerName: Lokal - India's No 1 Local News, Local Jobs App

title: Lokal App - Telugu, Tamil & Hindi Local News, Jobs

creator: Lokal - India's No 1 Local News, Local Jobs App
descriptionHtml:
Lokal News App provides news in three regional languages; Tamil, Telugu & Hindi.
Download our breaking news app (பிரேக்கிங் நியூஸ் / బ్రేకింగ్ వార్తలు) for live news from all over India. Right from:
Current affairs (தற்போதைய நிகழ்வுகள்)
Political news (அரசியல் செய்தி / రాజకీయ వార్తలు)
Trending news (ట్రెండింగ్ వార్తలు)
Sports news (விளையாட்டு செய்திகள்)
Business news (व्यवसाय / వాణిజ్య వ్యాపార వార్తలు)
Live news updates (நேரடி செய்தி / ప్రత్యక్షసమాచారం)
Viral news (வைரஸ் செய்தி)
District news (జిల్లా వార్తలు / மாவட்ட செய்திகள்)
Entertainment news & movie updates (பொழுதுபோக்கு மற்றும் திரைப்பட புதுப்பிப்புகள்)
Employment news (வேலைவாய்ப்பு செய்திகள்)
Download now to get news updates national & international (జాతీయ మరియు అంతర్జాతీయ వార్తలు) from all our secured and trusted news sources.



Features (లక్షణాలు / அம்சங்கள்) :


All in one news updates (వార్తల నవీకరణలు) :
Download now to receive real-time updates and read local news, agricultural news, current affairs, sports news, health news (ఆరోగ్య సమాచార వార్తలు), viral news (வைரஸ் செய்தி) and much more in the form of news videos in your regional language Tamil news, Telugu news & Hindi news.


Short Video News (வீடியோ செய்தி) :
Watch short news videos (సంక్షిప్త వార్తలు). News stories & updates in short. Save time and follow up with all your daily news updates (தினசரி செய்திகள்).

Local Jobs Online (ఉద్యోగాలు ఆన్‌లైన్) :
The app not only performs as a news portal but also a platform to apply for local jobs online. Receive news on job openings & job updates (வேலை புதுப்பிப்புகள்) & everything related to it. Apply now to bag your dream job online on the app itself. All this and much more on the Lokal news app.
Apply for Government jobs ( सरकारी नौकरियों के लिए आवेदन करें) & receive job notifications (வேலை அறிவிப்புகள்)
(அரசாங்க வேலை எச்சரிக்கைகள்) Government Job updates, alerts & news from the following states Telangana, Hyderabad, Uttar Pradesh & Tamil Nadu

Political Local Video Updates (அரசியல் செய்தி) :
Keep up to date with the current elections and political happenings in the form of local news from the city, district & state.


Sports News (క్రీడా వార్తలు) :
National sports news (క్రీడా వార్తలు), cricket news (நேரடி கிரிக்கெட் புதுப்பிப்புகள்) & updates. Get sports video news and updates with the most viral videos only on the Lokal app. Live cricket & kabaddi updates.

Entertainment News (பொழுதுபோக்கு செய்தி) :
Read all about the latest celebrity gossip and industry news. Learn about current and upcoming movies, reviews.


Viral Videos Online (వైరల్ వీడియోలు) :
Latest popular and viral videos online (வைரல் வீடியோக்கள்) to keep you entertained all day. Watch viral videos and content from all around the world and share it with your friends and family on social media.


Share News Online (செய்தி ஆன்லைன்) :
Share the news you read and watch, with all your friends and family easily with the easy share button and stream video news right from the app to various other platforms like Facebook, Whatsapp or Instagram. Share the video news stories you like over whatsapp stories or status updates. Bring out the reporter in you and become a journalist. Submit stories from around you through your smartphone.


Daily Horoscope & Astrology (జ్యోతిషశాస్త్రం వార్తలు) :
Daily updates for all sun signs in 2020.

With the Lokal App you can keep track with not only the latest headlines but also do a lot more, like find and apply for local & government jobs, receive job updates, go through your daily horoscope, read the latest the Bollywood e-news and the hot topics, lifestyle news, know the political scenario in the region, state or district and a lot more.
descriptionShort: Indian breaking news with live videos and updates (தமிழ் செய்தி, తెలుగు వార్తలు)

Apply for Government jobs ( सरकारी नौकरियों के लिए आवेदन करें) & receive job notifications (வேலை அறிவிப்புகள்)
(அரசாங்க வேலை எச்சரிக்கைகள்) Government Job updates, alerts & news from the following states Telangana, Hyderabad, Uttar Pradesh & Tamil Nadu

Political Local Video Updates (அரசியல் செய்தி) :
Keep up to date with the current elections and political happenings in the form of local news from the city, district & state.


Sports News (క్రీడా వార్తలు) :
National sports news (క్రీడా వార్తలు), cricket news (நேரடி கிரிக்கெட் புதுப்பிப்புகள்) & updates. Get sports video news and updates with the most viral videos only on the Lokal app. Live cricket & kabaddi updates.

Entertainment News (பொழுதுபோக்கு செய்தி) :
Read all about the latest celebrity gossip and industry news. Learn about current and upcoming movies, reviews.


Viral Videos Online (వైరల్ వీడియోలు) :
Latest popular and viral videos online (வைரல் வீடியோக்கள்) to keep you entertained all day. Watch viral videos and content from all around the world and share it with your friends and family on social media.


Share News Online (செய்தி ஆன்லைன்) :
Share the news you read and watch, with all your friends and family easily with the easy share button and stream video news right from the app to various other platforms like Facebook, Whatsapp or Instagram. Share the video news stories you like over whatsapp stories or status updates. Bring out the reporter in you and become a journalist. Submit stories from around you through your smartphone.


Daily Horoscope & Astrology (జ్యోతిషశాస్త్రం వార్తలు) :
Daily updates for all sun signs in 2020.

With the Lokal App you can keep track with not only the latest headlines but also do a lot more, like find and apply for local & government jobs, receive job updates, go through your daily horoscope, read the latest the Bollywood e-news and the hot topics, lifestyle news, know the political scenario in the region, state or district and a lot more.

appDetails.developerName: Lokal - Made in India Local News, Local Jobs App

title: Lokal App - Telugu & Tamil Indian Local News, Jobs

creator: Lokal - Made in India Local News, Local Jobs App
descriptionHtml:
Lokal News App with 1M+ trusted readers, providing Indian local news live in regional languages like Telugu & Tamil. Download the app & enjoy short video news live from all over India along with a variety of Hyperlocal content in regional languages. Easy & accessible hyperlocal new; Right from:

●Current affairs
●Local jobs & employment news
●Political news
●Sports news
●Crime news
●National news
●International news
●Business news
●Technology related news
●Health news
●Agricultural news
●Entertainment news
●Movie updates
●Devotional content

Video news app to get your daily dose of information & news updates from across the world through our secured and trusted sources.

Lokal is a one-stop platform for a variety of hyperlocal content like news from agriculture to politics, daily information on essentials like food and petrol prices, classifieds by local businesses & individual sellers, jobs updates ranging from local to government and life skill tips like finance, education, health, farming and more.

✨Features:

📰Local news updates
Get real-time updates on public news and hyperlocal content related to politics, health, sports, agriculture and business in the form of articles and videos in the regional languages like Telugu and Tamil.

👨‍🎓Local jobs online
The app is more than just a news portal as it provides local job news and updates, that help out candidates looking for new opportunities. Download the app and receive news on job updates & apply for local jobs in Telugu & Tamil, government jobs and also receive job notifications from Indian states of Telangana, Andhra Pradesh and Tamil Nadu.

🗳️Political Updates
Stay up to date with the current elections and latest political happenings in the form of local news updates & alerts across the various cities and districts of Telangana, Andhra Pradesh & Tamil Nadu. Learn about all the political headlines and current affairs in the form of articles & videos that you can also share with your friends and family.

🏏Sports News
Get live updates on international and national sports news & more in the form of new articles and viral videos. Find live cricket & kabaddi updates and also latest news on famous sports personalities like Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma, Mahendra Singh Dhoni, P.V Sindhu, Saina Nehwal and Sania Mirza.

🎭Entertainment News
Get all the latest celebrity gossip and industry news. Read about current and upcoming movies, reviews and get the front row seats while your favourite stars get candid about what they are up to! Find Tollywood, Bollywood & Kollywood news at it’s best in your regional languages.

🎥Online Viral Videos
Latest popular and viral videos at your fingertips to keep you entertained and informed. Watch viral videos and content in Telugu & Tamil from all around the world and share it with your friends and family on WhatsApp, Telegram and other social media handles.

💫Daily Horoscopes & Astrology
Get free daily predictions and horoscope updates for all the zodiac signs in your regional languages Tamil & Telugu.

Share News Online
Share the news that you read & watch with all your friends and family easily with the easy share button and stream live video news right from the app to various other platforms like Facebook, WhatsApp or Instagram. Bring out the reporter in you & become a contributor/journalist and submit stories from around you through your smartphone & get a chance to feature your articles & videos on our app.

Lokal is on a mission to spread awareness and get you the right news from the right sources. Catering to one and all, there is something for everyone. From local news headlines to politics, agriculture to entertainment updates and bulletins. Local job opportunities & regular news updates. Stand a chance to become a contributor and a part of our diverse user base.
descriptionShort: Get your daily update of live Telugu and Tamil local news, viral videos and jobs

appDetails.developerName: Lokal - Made in India Local News, Local Jobs App

title: Lokal App - Telugu & Tamil Local Public News, Jobs

creator: Lokal - Made in India Local News, Local Jobs App
descriptionHtml:
The Lokal News App is trusted by over 4M+ Indian readers breaking news in Telugu & Tamil.

Participate in the Lokal Premier League & win exciting prizes! Download Now!

Lokal is a one-stop platform for a variety of hyperlocal content, stay updated 24x7 with video news categories ranging from current affairs, politics, breaking news articles, crimes, sports, business, technology, devotional, agriculture or entertainment news & daily information on essentials like food and petrol prices, classifieds by local businesses & individual sellers, jobs updates and more.



Features of the Lokal App:

1) Regional Language News:
Read live local Telugu news & Tamil news, agricultural news, public news, current affairs, etc. in Telugu & Tamil language. We also bring to you Tamil Nadu, Andhra and Telangana News, Headlines & Updates.

2) Video Updates:
Watch Tamil & Telugu breaking news videos to keep readers up to date with the current happenings taking place in your city, district and state.

3) Apply for Local Jobs Online:
Find postings for ideal jobs in your area and get notified when new jobs are added. Apply for government jobs, private sector jobs, fresher jobs, 10th Pass jobs, 12th Pass jobs, UG jobs, PG jobs, Diploma jobs or part time jobs in telugu.

4) Sports Updates:
Follow your favourite sporting teams, tournaments and sports happenings right from the app. Get live match updates for cricket, kabaddi, badminton, football or tennis. Stay updated on your favourite sport and sportsperson.

5) Entertainment News:
Keep up with the latest celebrity gossip, learn about current and upcoming movies, reviews and follow what your favourite stars are upto! E News on what is happening in Tollywood, Kollywood & Bollywood.

6) Viral Videos:
Watch viral videos and content from all around the world and share it with your friends and family over various social media platforms. Download and share any online videos and news snippets straight to your WhatsApp status, Facebook and Messenger Stories or any groups you are part of. This lets you share news easily to all your contacts


7) Daily Horoscopes & Astrology:
Get free daily predictions and horoscope updates for all the zodiac signs in your regional languages Tamil & Telugu.

8) Political News:
Stay up to date with the current elections and latest political happenings & alerts across the various cities, districts or jillas of Telangana, Andhra Pradesh & Tamil Nadu. Learn about all the political headlines and current affairs in the form of articles & videos

9) Share Local News:
Bring out the reporter in you & become a contributor/journalist and submit stories from around you through your smartphone, send in any news, videos and updates of your area or near you, that you think people will like & get your articles & videos featured on our app.

10) Lokal Services:
- Matrimony: Matrimony services helping people find a suitable partner. Upload your profile and get discovered.
- Job Postings: Find your dream job locally. Get regular job recruitment and vacancy updates. Apply from the app itself.
- Real Estate: Buy, sell and rent out properties. Get updates with property and land details.
- Buy & Sell: Exchange new or used items with other users. Find an ideal buyer that matches your terms and complete the trade.
- Home Services: Get plumbers, electricians, cleaners and many other essential services, right at your doorstep.
- Wishes: Surprise your family and friends durings birthdays, anniversaries or any other occasion with a personalised greeting. Send in your requests and we will feature your wishes on the app.

Lokal is on a mission to cater to one and all, there is something for everyone. Download the Lokal App today!
descriptionShort: Tamil and Telugu video news, business classifieds, job updates, services & more

appDetails.developerName: Lokal - Made in India Local News, Local Jobs App
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This is a beta release.
What is a beta release?
Beta is the testing phase of the app before releasing it to complete audience. During this testing phase we can capture stability and performance issues and fix them. This helps us create a more stable and nicer experience for our users.

We will periodically release new features and improvements on beta from now on. Please participate and give us feedback. Since this is beta expect some crashes.

Lokal is a one-stop platform for a variety of Hyperlocal content, such as: daily updates and information about essentials like food and Daily commodities prices, classifieds by local businesses and individual sellers, local job updates, not only that but also information about business technology, devotional content, agriculture, entertainment updates, advertisements, real estate, buy & sell of new and owned products and Tamil & Telugu matrimonial services at your fingertips.

Features of the Lokal App

1) Content in regional languages:
You can track all the recent activities going on in and around your area through the Lokal app, available in Tamil and Telugu. All you need to do is select your state and the language of your choice and everything right from local businesses in your area to the current job openings will be available on your phone.

2) Video Updates:
The app is a digital magazine with videos. Watch trending videos from in and around your region. Get viral videos and content from all around the world and share it with your friends and family over various social media platforms. Download and share any online videos or snippets straight to your WhatsApp status, Facebook and Messenger Stories or any groups you are a part of.

3) Apply for Local Jobs Online:
Find postings for ideal jobs in your area and get notified when new jobs are added. Apply for jobs, private sector jobs, fresher jobs, 10th Pass jobs, 12th Pass jobs, UG jobs, PG jobs, Diploma jobs or part time jobs in telugu.

4) Sports Updates:
Follow your favourite sport, teams, tournaments and athletes right from the app. Get live match updates for cricket, kabaddi, badminton, football or tennis. Stay updated on your favourite sport and sportsperson.

5) Entertainment:
Keep up with the latest celebrity gossip, learn about current and upcoming movies, reviews and follow what your favourite stars are upto! Stay up to date on what is happening in Tollywood, Kollywood & Bollywood.

7) Daily Horoscopes & Astrology:
Get free daily predictions and horoscope updates for all the zodiac signs in your regional languages Tamil & Telugu.

8) Political updates:
Stay up to date with the current elections and latest political happenings & alerts across the various cities, districts or jillas of Telangana, Andhra Pradesh and Tamil Nadu. Learn about all the political matters and current affairs in the form of articles & videos

9) Share Local updates:
Bring out the reporter in you & become a contributor/journalist and submit stories from around you through your smartphone. Send in any videos or updates of your area, that you think people will like & get your articles & videos featured on our app.

10) Lokal Services:
-Matrimony: Matrimony services helping people find a suitable partner. Upload your profile and get discovered.
-Job Postings: Find your dream job locally. Get regular job recruitment and vacancy updates. Apply from the app itself.
-Real Estate: Buy, sell and rent out properties. Get updates with property and land details.
-Buy & Sell: Exchange new or used items with other users. Find an ideal buyer that matches your terms and complete the trade.
-Home Services: Get plumbers, electricians, cleaners and many other essential services, right at your doorstep.
-Wishes: Surprise your family and friends durings birthdays, anniversaries or any other occasion with a personalised greeting. Send in your requests and we will feature your wishes on the app.

Lokal is on a mission to cater to one and all, there is something for everyone. Download the Lokal App today!

The Lokal App is a local platform trusted by over 8M+ Indians, with local updates, Local Jobs Local Classifieds and Local Businesses in your own language.

Lokal is a one-stop platform for a variety of Hyperlocal content, such as: daily updates and information about essentials like food and Daily commodities prices, classifieds by local businesses and individual sellers, local job updates, not only that but also information about business technology, devotional content, agriculture, entertainment updates, advertisements, real estate, buy & sell of new and owned products and Tamil & Telugu matrimonial services at your fingertips.

Features of the Lokal App

1) Content in regional languages:
You can track all the recent activities going on in and around your area through the Lokal app, available in Kannada, Tamil and Telugu. All you need to do is select your state and the language of your choice and everything right from local updates, businesses in your area to the current job openings will be available on your phone.

2) Video Updates:
The app is a digital magazine with videos. Watch trending videos from in and around your region. Get viral video content from all around the world, download it and share it with your friends and family over Whatsapp, Facebook, Instagram and other social media sited.

3) Apply for Local Jobs Online:
Find postings for ideal jobs in your area and get notified when new jobs are added. Apply for jobs, private sector jobs, fresher jobs, 10th Pass jobs, 12th Pass jobs, UG jobs, PG jobs, Diploma jobs or part time jobs in Kannada, Tamil and Telugu.

4) Sports Updates:
Follow your favourite sport, teams right from the app. Get live match updates for cricket, kabaddi, badminton, football or tennis. Play quizzes and get updated about upcoming IPL

5) Connect with your community:
Connect with your community to share your views in your own language. You can see updates about the community and its members. You can also discuss about the issues in the community, ask questions or get opinion of community members, and create community events.

7) Daily Horoscopes & Astrology:
Get free daily predictions and horoscope updates for all the zodiac signs in your regional languages Kannada, Tamil & Telugu.

8) Political updates:
Stay up to date with the current elections and latest political happenings & alerts across the various cities, districts or jillas of Karnataka, Telangana, Andhra Pradesh and Tamil Nadu. Learn about all the political matters and current affairs.

9) Share Local updates:
Bring out the reporter in you & become a contributor/journalist and submit stories from around you through your smartphone and earn money. Send in any videos or updates of your area and get your articles & videos featured on our app.

10) Lokal Services:
-Matrimony: Matrimony services helping people find a suitable partner. Upload your profile and get discovered.
-Job Postings: Find your dream job locally. Get regular job recruitment and vacancy updates. Apply from the app itself.
-Real Estate: Buy, sell and rent out properties. Get updates with property and land details.
-Buy & Sell: Exchange new or used items with other users. Find an ideal buyer that matches your terms and complete the trade.
-Home Services: Get plumbers, electricians, cleaners and many other essential services, right at your doorstep.
-Wishes: Surprise your family and friends durings birthdays, anniversaries or any other occasion with a personalised greeting. Send in your requests and we will feature your wishes on the app.

Lokal is on a mission to cater to one and all, there is something for everyone. Download the Lokal App today!

Bring out the reporter in you & become a contributor/journalist and submit stories from around you through your smartphone and earn money. Send in any videos or updates of your area and get your articles & videos featured on our app.

10) Lokal Services:
-Matrimony: Matrimony services helping people find a suitable partner. Upload your profile and get discovered.
-Job Postings: Find your dream job locally. Get regular job recruitment and vacancy updates. Apply from the app itself.
-Real Estate: Buy, sell and rent out properties. Get updates with property and land details.
-Buy & Sell: Exchange new or used items with other users. Find an ideal buyer that matches your terms and complete the trade.
-Home Services: Get plumbers, electricians, cleaners and many other essential services, right at your doorstep.
-Wishes: Surprise your family and friends durings birthdays, anniversaries or any other occasion with a personalised greeting. Send in your requests and we will feature your wishes on the app.

Lokal is on a mission to cater to one and all, there is something for everyone. Download the Lokal App today!
descriptionShort: Job alerts, Matrimony, Community, Sports update, Political update, Video update

Why Choose Lokal?

⛥Get all the latest local updates in your regional language including Telugu, Kannada, Tamil, Malayalam, Gujarati, Bengali & Marathi.

⛤Stay updated on all the local happenings from in and around your region through this app.

⛤Receive daily updates on politics, entertainment, crimes, technology, agriculture, as well as alerts on all the languages & latest trending topics.

⛤Check your astrology & horoscope predictions, view devotional content & get international updates.

⛤Connect with your online community by sharing your views on topics or sharing local updates through this public app.

⛤Use the Tamil matrimony, Telugu matrimony, Tripura matrimony & Kannada matrimony services to find a suitable partner within your community easily by uploading your profile online, getting discovered, and discovering other profiles on matrimony.

⛤Get notified of local jobs updates, find jobs, jobs postings, search job easily & get an employment update on your online job application.

⛤Get local classifieds by businesses & individual sellers, real estate deals, advertisements, buy and sell new or used products or give a public announcement.

Top Features of the Lokal App:

☑Choose your state & language to receive customized alerts based on your district, city, or state in your native language. Get updates on all the local happenings by Telugu, Tamil, Kannada updates media & trending topics from your state or anywhere around the world.

☑Receive daily entertainment alerts of your favourite Bollywood & Hollywood celebrities, sports updates on the upcoming cricket matches, & devotional content updates. Get daily predictions & horoscope updates for all zodiac signs.

☑Looking for jobs in India? Look no further, Lokal is also a jobs app for daily local jobs updates, online side jobs, latest local jobs, employment updates, daily jobs updates, jobs for women in Karnataka & Tamil Nadu, or any other work in India. You don’t need any other jobs alert app. This local app is the perfect app to get you a Naukri or earn from home jobs.

☑Stay updated about the current political updates across the various cities, districts, or Jillas of Karnataka, Telangana, Andhra Pradesh, Tamil Nadu, Gujarat, West Bengal and Maharashtra.

☑Use the matrimony services & find an ideal match. No need for you to download a separate Kannada, Tamil, or Telugu matrimony app.

☑The app also includes video content, along with articles and pictures. Download the videos or share the articles with your friends and family on social media.

☑Join the community talk and get community updates & get public updates on members. For eg. join the Tamil community, discuss issues, ask questions or get opinions of community members, & create community events.

☑Submit stories from your region & around you. Send in pictures, videos, or articles of your area.

☑Get home services like plumbers, electricians, cleaners & many other essential services at your doorstep. Finally, surprise your family & friends for their birthdays, anniversaries or any other occasion with a personalised greeting.

descriptionHtml:
Lokal is your community app that helps you find latest local content updates, search for jobs in your area for absolutely free now! Available in your own language, you don't have to hunt anywhere else. Indeed the perfect place for anything local!

LOCAL UPDATES
Local at it's best : Get daily local updates from your taluk, district, state including India and international news. News from all locations in India such as Hyderabad, Chennai, Bangalore, Mumbai, Sholapur, Ahemdabad Coimbatore, Chittoor, Mysore, Madurai & more!

⛤Diverse languages : Lokal is available in different regional languages including telugu, annada, Tamil, Malayalam, Gujarati, Bengali & Marathi.

⛤Daily updates on district commodity prices : petrol, diesel, LPG, gold, silver, meat, groceries and more.

⛤50+ content categories : Receive alerts on politics, entertainment, crime, technology, business, agriculture, devotional, trending, and more!

⛤Get instant alerts on latest breaking news and live news updates. Read in short news & in video formats!

⛤Panchang updates & rashifal prediction : Read daily news, horoscopes, check panchang & consult experts to get accurate life prediction.

⛤You can also submit live stories through pictures, videos and articles happening near you and become a publisher!

Inshort, be the local guru with Lokal App!

LOCAL JOB SEARCH APP
Find latest job openings in your locality for free now on our jobs app. Connect with the HR directly and get hired!
Create your job profile inshort and receive relevant job alerts.

⛤Diverse Qualifications : Whether you are 10th pass, 12th pass, diploma, or degree holder, find jobs suitable to your qualification.

⛤250+ Locations : Search for jobs within your district, state and also work anywhere in India. Filter jobs based on your choice of location and apply to latest jobs. Find jobs across locations like Telangana, Andhra Pradesh, Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, Maharashtra,Punjab, Kerala.

⛤150+ Job Roles : Find latest jobs from different roles like Admin/Telecaller, Receptionist, Marketing, HR, BPO, Data entry, Work from home(WFH), cashier, graphic designer, business development, medical, technician, welder, cook, driver, hospitality jobs, housekeeping, nurse, security guard, retail courier, biker and rider, clerk, peon, part time jobs, beautician jobs, delivery boy jobs, civil engineer, carpenter, aircraft maintenance, chemical engineer, AC technician and more.

⛤Get updates on latest government and private job opening alerts across India for free now.

⛤Employers can also hire for their job requirements and get their first job post for free!

The perfect naukri is just one step away on our job search app.

LOCAL UPDATES
Local at it's best : Get daily local updates from your taluk, district, state including India and international news. News from all locations in India such as Hyderabad, Chennai, Bangalore, Mumbai, Sholapur, Ahemdabad Coimbatore, Chittoor, Mysore, Madurai & more!

⛤Diverse languages : Lokal is available in different regional languages including telugu, annada, Tamil, Malayalam, Gujarati, Bengali & Marathi.

⛤Daily updates on district commodity prices : petrol, diesel, LPG, gold, silver, meat, groceries and more.

⛤50+ content categories : Receive alerts on politics, entertainment, crime, technology, business, agriculture, devotional, trending, and more!

⛤Get instant alerts on latest breaking news and live news updates. Read in short news & in video formats!

⛤Panchang updates & rashifal prediction : Read daily news, horoscopes, check panchang & consult experts to get accurate life prediction.

⛤You can also submit live stories through pictures, videos and articles happening near you and become a publisher!

Inshort, be the local guru with Lokal App!

LOCAL JOB SEARCH APP
Find latest job openings in your locality for free now on our jobs app. Connect with the HR directly and get hired!
Create your job profile inshort and receive relevant job alerts.

⛤Diverse Qualifications : Whether you are 10th pass, 12th pass, diploma, or degree holder, find jobs suitable to your qualification.

⛤250+ Locations : Search for jobs within your district, state and also work anywhere in India. Filter jobs based on your choice of location and apply to latest jobs. Find jobs across locations like Telangana, Andhra Pradesh, Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, Maharashtra,Punjab, Kerala.

⛤150+ Job Roles : Find latest jobs from different roles like Admin/Telecaller, Receptionist, Marketing, HR, BPO, Data entry, Work from home(WFH), cashier, graphic designer, business development, medical, technician, welder, cook, driver, hospitality jobs, housekeeping, nurse, security guard, retail courier, biker and rider, clerk, peon, part time jobs, beautician jobs, delivery boy jobs, civil engineer, carpenter, aircraft maintenance, chemical engineer, AC technician and more.

⛤Get updates on latest government and private job opening alerts across India for free now.

⛤Employers can also hire for their job requirements and get their first job post for free!

The perfect naukri is just one step away on our job search app.

LOCAL CLASSIFIEDS
Matrimony : Use Lokal's tamil, telugu, kannada, marathi matrimony service to find a perfect match for yourself. Create your profile and filter your search based on location, caste and more!

Real Estate: Buy and Sell properties within your locality and get the best deals.

Buy n Sell : Get business on Lokal App by buying and selling commodities

Business owners : Advertise your enterprise on Lokal and get more profits!

Wishes : Share a message inshort to your loved one's on Lokal App for their birthdays, anniversaries

The only local app you need is Lokal App!

Disclaimer : None of the government related information, jobs and content hosted on the app is created by the Lokal App. The information is gathered from various official sources and related websites of jobs, news etc. We are not an official application and we do not represent any one else. All the sources and websites have copyrights of their owners and not endorsed by any of their owners, and are used purely and only for informative purposes. We are not responsible for any discrepancies. No copyright violation & infringement are intended.

Please find the link to our privacy policy - https://getlokalapp.com/?page_id=3

Contact Us:
support@getlokalapp.com
Our Websites:
telugu.getlokalapp.com
tamil.getlokalapp.com

⛤Whether you are 8/10/12 pass, diploma, or degree holder, ITI, BSc., MSc.

⛤Find latest jobs from different roles like Admin/Telecaller, receptionist, Marketing jobs, HR, BPO, Data entry, Work from home(WFH), field sales jobs, technician, cook, delivery jobs, hospitality jobs, housekeeping, nurse, security guard, beautician jobs, delivery boy jobs, AC technician jobs

Lokal is your community app that helps you find latest local content updates, and search for jobs in your area for absolutely free now! Available in your own language, you don't have to hunt anywhere else. Indeed the perfect place for anything local!

Get everything local, breaking news, top headlines, and daily updates in categories like India news, international news, politics, cricket, business, entertainment, and technology. Languages available - తెలుగు, தமிழ், ಕನ್ನಡ, मराठी, ગુજરાતી, മലയാളം, বাংলা, and ਪੰਜਾਬੀ. Join Lokal now to stay updated on the latest and trending news, access job opportunities, and engage with your community like never before!

LOCAL UPDATES
Receive your daily local updates covering news from your taluk, district, and state. Stay connected with both Indian and international news, spanning across locations like Hyderabad, Krishna-Vijayawada, Chennai, Bangalore, Mumbai, Pune, Ahmedabad, Coimbatore, Chittoor, Mysore, Madurai, and more! Stay informed about the latest headlines, breaking news, and trending stories.

⛤Lokal is available in these languages - Telugu, Kannada, Tamil, Marathi & 3 more
⛤Daily updates on district commodity prices: Petrol, Diesel, LPG, gold, silver, meat, groceries and more.
⛤Receive alerts on politics, entertainment, crime, technology, business, agriculture, devotional, trending, cricket and more!
⛤Get instant alerts on the latest breaking news and live news updates
⛤Panchang updates & rashifal prediction: Horoscopes, check panchang & consult experts to get accurate life predictions

Inshort, be the local guru with Lokal App! Stop your daily hunt for news apps, and find your way to the best news app

LOCAL JOB SEARCH APP
Find the latest job openings in your locality for free now on our jobs app. Connect with HR directly and get hired! Create your job profile in short and receive relevant job alerts

⛤Whether you are 8/10/12 pass, diploma, or degree holder, ITI, BSc., MSc.
⛤Search for jobs within your district, state and also work anywhere in India. Filter jobs based on your choice of location and apply to latest jobs.
⛤Find latest jobs from different roles like Admin/Telecaller, receptionist, Marketing jobs, HR, BPO, Data entry, Work from home(WFH), field sales jobs, technician, cook, delivery jobs, hospitality jobs, housekeeping, nurse, security guard, beautician jobs, delivery boy jobs, AC technician jobs
⛤Get updates on latest government and private job opening alerts for free now
⛤Recruiters can also hire for their job requirements and get their first job post for free!
⛤The perfect naukri is just one step away from our job search app.

LOCAL CLASSIFIEDS
⛤Matrimony: Use Lokal's matrimony service to find a perfect match for yourself. Create your profile and filter your search based on location, caste and more!
⛤Real Estate: Buy and Sell properties within your locality and get the best deals.
⛤Buy n Sell: Get business on Lokal App by buying and selling commodities
⛤Business owners: Advertise your enterprise on Lokal and get more profits!

Disclaimer: None of the government-related information, jobs and content hosted on the app is created by the Lokalapp independently and is gathered from various sources and websites. All the sources and websites are copyrights of their owners not endorsed by any of their owners, and are used purely and only for informative purposes. No copyright violation & infringement is intended.

Sources:
National Job Portal - https://www.ncs.gov.in/pages/govt-job-vacancies.aspx#main
SSC - https://ssc.nic.in/
Telangana Govt Jobs - https://www.tspsc.gov.in/, https://www.tslprb.in/
Andhra Pradesh Govt jobs - https://psc.ap.gov.in/, https://slprb.ap.gov.in/, https://apssdc.in/home/homepage
Telangana I&PR - https://ipr.telangana.gov.in/
Andhra Pradesh I&PR - https://ipr.ap.nic.in/

Please find the link to our privacy policy - https://getlokalapp.com/?page_id=3

Contact Us:
support@getlokalapp.com

Our Websites:
telugu.getlokalapp.com
tamil.getlokalapp.com

descriptionHtml:

Available in your language, you don't have to hunt anywhere else. Indeed, it is the perfect place for anything local! More than 2 crore Indians trust Lokal App

🇮🇳 Made in India app rated for top Telugu, Tamil, Kannada, Marathi, Malayalam, Gujarati, Punjabi, & Bengali updates. Hindustan’s national stories come to your fingertips. We provide updates faster than Indian Express trains. Breaking notifications are shared with you daily at various times of the day

Get everything local, breaking stories, top headlines, and daily updates in categories like live updates in India, Telangana election updates, ICC cricket world cup, business, & entertainment. Videos, latest images & viral cards in తెలుగు, தமிழ், ಕನ್ನಡ, मराठी, ગુજરાતી, മലയാളം, বাংলা, and ਪੰਜਾਬੀ

LIVE CRICKET UPDATES
Lokal App provides national sports updates about the Indian cricket team. We provide live cricket scorecards during cricket league matches, IPL & World Cup tournaments. Get minute-to-minute action so that users will not miss out on any highlights

WEATHER & OTHER LOCAL UPDATES
Unleash the power of Lokal for your daily weather insights. Get the most accurate and up-to-date forecasts, temperature reports, and weather conditions. Get weather forecasts that are more accurate and faster than TV. Share with everyone information on weather updates in their area

DIVERSE GENRES
Politics, Entertainment, Sports, Business, Weather, Astrology, Sarkari schemes, Sarkari Results, Technology, South Indian movie updates & more.

Daily updates on district commodity prices: Petrol, Diesel, LPG, gold, silver, meat, groceries
Panchang updates & rashifal prediction: Horoscopes, check panchang & consult experts to get accurate life predictions
Inshort, be the local guru with Lokal App! Stop your daily hunt for other apps, and find your way to the best app for local updates

LOCAL JOB SEARCH APP
- Find the latest job openings in your locality for free now on our jobs app. Connect with HR directly and get hired! Create your job profile in short and receive relevant job alerts
- Search for jobs within your district, or state and also work anywhere in India. Filter jobs based on your choice of location and apply to the latest jobs. Find Sarkari jobs and updates about sarkari exam results
- Find all jobs from different roles like Admin/Telecaller, receptionist, Marketing jobs, HR, BPO, Data entry, Work from home(WFH), field sales jobs, technician, cook, delivery jobs, hospitality jobs, housekeeping, nurse, security guard, beautician jobs, delivery boy jobs, AC technician jobs
- Get updates on all government and private job opening alerts for free now
